name: Userstyles.org*Ergo - Little tweaks for navigation
description:
Tries to improve slightly the usability...

On styles pages :
- Screenshots a lot bigger to immediately see what it looks like
- Styles meta-information visualy differentiated

Global changes :
- Lines under links removed to facilitate reading
- Bigger search areas and menus
- Elements more separated
- Bigger pagination
- Various small tweaks...

The *Ergo collection aims at improving usability without touching what makes the « soul » of websites. So no radical changes, website is still recognizable at first sight. You can find more *Ergo styles by clicking on my name up there.
